title: Change up-for-grabs to help wanted
body:
Fixes #7900

### Context
`help wanted` has better github integrations

nodes.body:
@rokonec @AR-May @MichalPavlik,

Flaky test was Microsoft.Build.Engine.UnitTests.MSBuildServer_Tests.CanShutdownServerProcess(byBuildManager: False) (on mac). I hit rerun. No need to investigate unless you see a pattern.

> Labels with spaces are a pain when searching and sharing URLs.

agreed, but it'd require another PR into up-for-grabs. I'm aiming for minimal effort here tbh 😅

also, thanks for the suggestion, I committed it in!

```suggestion
* See our [help wanted issues](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22help+wanted%22) for a list of issues we think are great to onboard new developers.
```
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +73,7 @@ Before you contribute, please read through the contributing and developer guides
    - [Full Framework](documentation/wiki/Building-Testing-and-Debugging-on-Full-Framework-MSBuild.md)
    - [Mono](documentation/wiki/Building-Testing-and-Debugging-on-Mono-MSBuild.md)
 
-* See our [up for grabs issues](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Aup-for-grabs) for a list of issues we think are great to onboard new developers.
+* See our [up for grabs issues](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22help+wanted%22) for a list of issues we think are great to onboard new developers.
